title: Programmer/Analyst
responsibilities: Developing a custom Framework and Platform using C#.Net for use in a cutting-edge EHR.
Creating an admin portal for EHR governance using WPF.
Designing, maintaining and improving security measures for a variety of enterprise applications, including integration of SSO via AD Federated Identity using OAuth 2 and OpenID Connect.
Producing an API for healthcare applications, using ASP.NET Web API and ASP.Net Core MVC.
Implementing enterprise level messaging and eventing systems via Microsoft Azure.

title: Programmer/Analyst Intern
responsibilities: Created a cross platform Android/iOS app for clinic patients using Xamarin.

Contributed to a DDD focus design.
Produced a backing data store using Microsoft SQL Server hosted on Azure.

title: Mobile Development Intern
responsibilities: Developed the publically available Menards application for both iOS and Android.
